concept.title: Multiple Data Collector Instances
concept.shortdesc: You can create multiple instances. Each instance uses the same executables, but can be configured differently and run different pipelines.

conbody.p: Data Collectormultiple instancesYou might create multiple instances when you want to run several s on the same host machine. You can run the instances at the same time, as long as the host machine has enough resources.Any other limitations? Anything else to highlight as a reason to use it?

When you create an additional instance, the new instance includes any customization that you have implemented. When the creates a new instance, it copies the etc and libexec directories to the new instance. This includes the existing configuration file and related files, and the environment configuration file.
